title.rendered: Roadtrips’ Top Ten Most Memorable Custom Sports Travel Experiences

content.rendered:
At Roadtrips, we strive to create custom travel experiences that are sure to satisfy even the most discerning sports fan. We believe your trip to your dream sports event can only be planned by you, and we want to make that experience as memorable as possible.

So here’s a list of our top 10 most memorable, unforgettable sports travel experiences that we can create for you and your guests:

  1. 2014 Super Bowl: This event is considered by many to be the pinnacle of all sporting events. We offer a customizable travel experience to next year’s Super Bowl in New York, where you can choose from a range of luxury hotel accommodations in the Big Apple, pick out the perfect seats in the MetLife Stadium, and get access to the hottest VIP Super Bowl parties.
  2. 2014 Champions League Final: Lisbon, Portugal plays host to next year’s Champions League Final match – the most-watched sporting event in the world! Enjoy the beautiful beaches of this popular vacation spot when you’re not taking in a match, and customize your trip with city tours, private guides and more.
  3. 2014 NBA All-Star Game: Watch the best in basketball play in an exciting practice game, rookie challenge, and of course, the big All-Star game. Enjoy them all in historic New Orleans next year with this fully customizable adventure. We can put together an NBA All-Star Game package that allows you to experience the Big Easy’s best food, accommodations and attractions.
  4. 2014 Wimbledon Final: A more sophisticated sporting trip of the group, you’ll gain exclusive access to the world-famous Gatsby Club where you’ll dine and enjoy afternoon tea, as well as tickets to the final match and accommodations of your choosing. As part of your Wimbledon Final trip, take this opportunity to explore London, take in some shows and dine at the Chef’s table at a top London restaurant.
  5. 2014 Monaco Grand Prix: While many Formula 1 Grand Prix events take place around the world, none are more memorable than the Monaco Grand Prix. With a custom package from Roadtrips, you’ll have access to the best race day viewing, and even get a VIP invitation to the exclusive Amber Lounge, fashion show and after-party. If you prefer, you can even choose to watch the race upon a luxurious fully catered yacht or terrace.
  6. 2014 Winter Games: Some of the most exciting sporting events on earth will take place in gorgeous Sochi, Russia this winter. The 2014 Winter Games are only available to a limited few who can get tickets, so book early to ensure the finest in accommodations and event seating.
  7. 2013 World Series: The ultimate American pastime takes the world stage this year in late October. With access to games 3 and 4 of the 2013 World Series, Roadtrips can help you experience baseball history. Customize your trip with the perfect accommodations, transportation to and from the stadium, local tours and tee times at golf courses in the area.
  8. 2014 Masters: Speaking of golf, why not head to the 2014 Masters next April? We can provide you with Masters badges to the rounds of your choice so you won’t miss your favorite players in action. Enjoy southern hospitality in the comfort of your luxury accommodations for a true Masters getaway.
  9. 2014 Kentucky Derby: Sit anywhere from the first floor all the way to Millionaires Row with exclusive access from the team at Roadtrips. The premier event in horse racing, the Kentucky Derby is an extravagant event full of fashion, luxury and celebrities.
  10. The World Cup 2014: The absolute biggest sports event in the world, taking place in 2014 in one of the most fun countries on earth is the World Cup in Brazil. Choose your preferred matches, a beachfront hotel, the city, add on extra nights, tours, dinner reservations and even translators. This is one of the best and most customizable travel packages we offer!

So there you have it. Ten of the most important sporting events in the world, and you can experience them all in your own way. Call one of our sports travel specialists to get a quote on your dream experience today!
